评论详情: I'm absolutely in love with this three-pack of women's joggers. They are incredibly comfortable, and the fit at the waist is just right. I often struggle with joggers that are too tight or too loose around the waist, but these have an elastic waistband with a drawstring that allows for easy adjustment. They sit comfortably without feeling restrictive.  The fact that they come in a three-pack is fantastic—I have multiple colors to choose from, so there's always a pair that goes with whatever I'm wearing. These joggers also have pockets, which is a huge plus! I can keep my phone, keys, or small essentials with me without having to carry a bag everywhere.  I wear them for just about everything. They're perfect for everyday wear, whether I'm running errands, lounging around the house, or hitting the gym. The fabric is soft and breathable, making them ideal for any activity. They hold up well in the wash, and the colors don't fade, which is great because I've been wearing them almost daily!  Overall, this three-pack of joggers is a fantastic buy. The comfort, fit, and versatility make them a must-have for anyone who wants stylish and functional joggers for multiple occasions. I highly recommend them!
I like the softness and thickness of these pants. Quality material. They are great for the gym, outdoor activities or just everyday wear.  I recommend.

Title says it all. These pants were EXACTLY what I was looking for. My only wish is that there could be a set offered that doesn’t contain black so that multiples can be ordered without have multiple black pairs included.

These pants are soft and look nice. The colors are vibrant and do not seem to fade after wash. No shrinkage. I weigh 145lbs, they are form fitting but not super tight, I ordered a medium. They are a little long but not terribly, I'm 5'3. My only issue with these pants is the pink pair came stained from being packaged against the black pair. I think it can be washed out. I won't be returning them because I typically don't. If they remain stained I'll use them around the house. They might want to think of placing tissue between the pants to avoid this.

评论概述: Thinner than I'd like, stitching issue with a pair, overall ok, would buy again a size down
评论详情: So let me start off by saying I do love these.. I definitely recommend going down a size from the usual wear as these are very thin.. thinner than normal leggings (so they look a little funny with any room) the stitching on one pair is falling apart after wearing them once only for a few hours. The pockets are HUGE which I absolutely love because I can never fit anything in my pockets but could legit fit a Stanley cup in these. They're very comfortable and they look okay.
I literally wear these almost every day. Go down a size. But they're so soft. Good quality. Love the pockets. Wash well. Breathable but not too thin.
Great deal!  Joggers are a great fit and comfortable.

I needed lightweight full length leggings for blocking the sun during hot weather runs.  I also use these for cool weather runs.  They serve both purposes perfectly!  They are lightweight, breathable, and the waistband never budges, which is unprecedented for leggings.  They have a pants vibe but don't balloon out into harem pants like most joggers do. The ankles also never budge. The look is sleek without being tights.  The best quality, however is the length.  I tried jogger after jogger which left a huge gap at the ankle, or the ankles would ride up, causing a gap.  I am 5' 8 1/2" and these are the perfect length - never too short.  The pockets are nice and flat and don't have that pocket material on the thigh adding bulk.  I have already purchased multiple packs and will never go back to tights!  Incredible value!

Bought these for my wife and she loves them. They’re soft and stretchable. Nice variety of colors, it would be nice not to have black in all their bundles of three. We thought they had a draw strap on the waist, but they don’t. She says they don’t need them anyway. She wears them with the legs all the way down or capri style. We ordered true size and they fit good. She says they’re very comfortable. The material is not thick, but it’s not thin either, feels like a good quality fabric. Looks like a good job on the stitching also. Real Essentials always puts out a good product.

I purchased these for my wife and although they are pictured to have a high, thick waistband, they do not!  The full waistband is high up but the elastic is only actually a small fraction of the full waistband.  She considered sizing up to XXL (and wish she did) as the elastic cuts right into her belly so she wears them mostly around her hips (here at home) in hopes that they eventually stretch out some.  We do love the colors and the fabric is nice & smooth though.Also, the pockets & phone shown are just like hers and it would be nice if the pockets were a bit bigger as she has an iPhone & it sticks out some making it easily droppable.
Love the perfect dit
I’m really sensitive to clothes I usually cannot tolerate polyester but these are awesome, can wear leggings or bike shorts underneath if cold
Absolutely LOVE these pants. I now have 9 pairs! Please don’t stop making these! I’ll need new ones when these wear out! I might buy more just to be sure I have enough 😊

评论概述: Overall, great - especially for the price point
评论详情: These actually surprised me - they're pretty nice! Colors are beautiful, material is soft and stretchy and very comfortable. I like a loose fit in joggers, got a standard small and they fit me perfectly - I'm 5'5, 108 lbs. A pack of 3 for $40(ish) puts each pair around $13. DEAL!!! I will say that I'm a bit concerned about how they'll wash because the darker colored pair packed next to the lighter colored pair in shipping actually rubbed off a little, darker onto lighter, see pic... I feel like that will wash off the peach colored pants BUT I'll definitely wash the darker pairs very carefully for a while, to keep them from ruining anything washed with them. I may try to update the review after I've had them for a while, but at this point I'll definitely buy more because the fit and feel and colors and price are all together awesome UPDATE 06/2024: These are still some of the best joggers I've had. I didn't notice any issues washing, they don't attract lint, the waist band is super comfy, no shrinkage anywhere. I love these for real. I'll keep the 4 stars just because of the color transfer onto the peach pair during shipping. That never came out. Hopefully they're packing them better now

I like the buttery texture, stretch of the fabric, and overall fit. I bought these for postpartum and feel they will serve their purpose. However, the stitching was uneven and loose on one of these—super disappointing. For the price, I was expecting a little more.
These are such great quality and fit.  I plan to buy other colors
I like the product, it was comfortable but it was a bigger medium i was expecting. Material was nice, I was expecting it to be thicker

Living in the deep south, I wear shorts almost year round. But I love fall and winter clothes and look forward to temperatures changing so I can wear them. Summer clothes are essential, but long sleeve shirts and comfy knit pants are like an all day hug. These pants arrived today and the fit is amazing. The material is soft, cozy, stretchy and I love them.
Perfect for my 86 year old body.

I love these joggers! I like how they do not have a drawstring waist, so I can wear them to yoga without being distracted by the string. They’re comfy for lounging around, breathable for exercising in, but also cute to wear out & about running errands. I am a size 6 & 5’1” and ordered a medium which fit perfectly on me - not too short or long, and not tight in the tummy. Only complaint is they are a bit thin and see thru when stretched which has made me nervous to order the lighter colors.
These pants are so soft and comfortable I was looking for an alternative to leggings and i definitely found it

These are a great fit however I returned the original ones because the light color pants had stains on the left leg part. It appeared almost like a darker color pant had rubbed off on it and bled onto the light color pants. The second set was exactly the same. This needs to be looked into you pay for 3 pants but can only wear 2 of them.

Not very true to size. Ordered my usual size, and felt they were tighter than should have been. However, materials and pockets are well tolerated.

I saw reviews that said there were holes or dye stains. I did not have any of that. I am 5' 7", 135 lbs, slim build. I ordered a Medium. They fit ok in the waist/hips but are a little weird in the area above the knee. That being said - I have skinny long legs. I wish they were a little longer. They do not seem too thin. I bought them to bike ride and walk in. I washed them and they came out fine. Will try to report back in a couple of months. Right now I am happy with my purchase.

Purchased these to replace my “airplane” pants as they became smaller and smaller even in a cold dryer.  Let us hope these do not!  I’ve found that most jogging pants pass thru security without triggering a pat down like jeans!  Although a friend that works at a hospital claim that microscopic metallic threads play havoc with a MRI.  Here is to hoping this is a win!!!!
Wear a lot very comfortable good price and quality
Like the color, texture, pockets,etc
Perfect fit, as a nurse they look professional all day. Easy wash and wear, no wrinkles. I bought all the colors, they are great!

I'd been looking for light weight joggers to lounge around the house in and be able to go out in. My expectations have been met. Once I see how they hold up in the laundry, if all goes well, I'll be ordering another set.
These fray easy and tear easy. But cute when new.

I’m a size 14 and typically XL bottoms, sometimes L. I got the Large in these based off some of the reviews. I got them in today and the fit is SO weird. Waist is fine but the crotch is  wacky. I’m returning them
Loved this product, comfortable, light weight,

I bought these to wear home post hospital stay, they run a little small and they were hard to pull up and down to use the restroom. The fabric is thick and they seem well-made. I will try them again once I am a little more stable.
They are true to size.
Love the material and very comfortable!
Not flattering in the crotch part and side pockets are wide open when pants on.

评论概述: I love the fit and the comfort.  Don't have to keep pulling them up
评论详情: I go the the gym 5 times a week and these are great for workout pants.  Especially spinning classes and Zumba classes
Just that Color was great

Update While these are very comfy, the area being big around the stomach is really bothering me. I want to roll them up. I don’t think it’s necessary the big area just made more for an extra long stanch area.  These are very comfy! I hesitated to take one star off as the stomach (think “apron” area) is baggy and I have to really pull the pants to prevent sagging. But they are light in fabric. Perfect for a spring day. Length is great! Love the pockets AND they look better than leggings!

These pants are great quality. The fabric is just the right thickness and have vibrant, fade resistant coloring. They quickly became my favorite casual pants to wear out shopping, to Pilates, or just around the house. Wash and wear fabric that is wrinkle resistant. Great value for a great product.
These are very comfortable and also presentable in business casual work setting. They still look good while feeling like a pajama. Highly recommend.
Fits great and smooth
I really like these so far. They a little tighter fit than I hoped but I still really like them.
I got cream black and blue. Blue color is not like in the picture but they are very comfortable
I’m 5’0 166 lbs very curvy on the bottom half. Fits great feels great.

I love the length cover's my ankles as I'm short and the crop look is not flattering for me. The fit is flattering and very comfortable. If you're worried about figure imperfections choose the dark colors as the material is on the thinner side, but breathable and very comfortable. Great buy for the price! I bought  a medium and they fit perfectly.

These are comfortable, though a little thin for colder weather. My only complaint is that they are a smidge long and run a little big for the size. But, the quality is great. I bet they would have been 5 stars if I had sized down
i like these leggings color i like the material don't feel cheap but i don't like the cuffing ankle bottom i will cut that part off

These pants fit well and are very comfortable, however the pants that appear to be cobalt blue actually came as dark teal- looking nothing like the image. I bought this particular pack for that color, so it was a bit disappointing.
Perfect sizing for larger ladies and good quality.
True to size. I do wish they had more cotton in them to make them softer. I do like the deep pockets for a phone while at the gym.
They are very comfortable, well made good quality fabric , beautiful colors, love the pockets! Light weight!
These joggers are a fabulous fit, so comfortable when I am biking.  I am a size small but bought a medium for a little extra room.  The size is perfect. Thanks

评论概述: I want them in every color.
评论详情: Best purchase ever! I bought an xxl and I'm a size 14 plus or 16 regular. I was looking for pants to wear in a clinic setting. I'm a massage therapist with hips and thighs. I Love the stretch and flexibility this gives me amd it's not restrictive. It also doesnt make any noise as I'm moving around. I hate pants that you can hear rub together as you're walking or moving. The pockets are great not too deep but not too shallow. The pants are not tight and a little loose so just right. I could size down if I wanted it to be a tight fit like a jegging.
I love the fabric & how it feels, but I need one size larger, they r 2 snug fitting so 1 size up is what I need

I bought these for an Alaskan cruise. I need pants that work during the day for adventures/ hikes but can be dressed up enough at night for dinner (a clean pair!!!). They seem to be rushed with construction (I have surged thread I am cutting off every pair.). I am currently 125 lbs (truth) and 5 feet 4 inches. I bought the M. They fit well. They aren’t skin tight but not overly baggie. The top of the pants is NOT tummy control like I thought they would be. I have a similar pair from Old Navy and they are tummy control compared to this brand. These don’t come close. The fabric is thicker than Lularoe Leggings but thinner than my Old Navy pair. Overall, for the price, they are a win and serve my need. Personally, I am keeping these because of the price point.
Love how it feels

Ok these run big. I bought XL so they'd be a little bit tight. Instead they're a little bit loose. Normally I'd buy a 2XL, but glad I didn't! The pockets are a little loose too. The fabric is nice and soft but pretty thin so my stuff bounces around in my pockets when I run. However, these were cheap, they look fine, and they're comfy. I'll probably buy them again, in a large.

I really like these joggers. Huge fan of having pockets. Only wish they were a little bit longer -I’m 5’10” so they are a bit short but not a problem. I like the high waistband especially since I’m wearing these post partum but I would have liked the elastic to be more like shape wear. Over all I’m happy with this find.
You don't have petite size, now I need to pay someone to shorten.
Very comfortable gym pants, especially for a hot summer. They are so comfortable that I don't feel like taking them off after exercising.

No reviews yet on these, so I felt I needed to add one. I was looking for sweatpants that provided a more polished look so that I wouldn’t be embarrassed to wear them out in public. These are perfect. They are a sleek/stretchy/athletic kind of material but don’t make the “swish swish” noise when walking. They are thick enough not to be see through (not sure about the lighter colors) but not so thick that they make you hot. Heck these could probably even be dressed up with some heels and a button down. Not sure about longevity yet but there’s no reason for me to think at this point that they won’t last. Glad I gave these a shot!
Lighter colors show every crease in your legs. Overall super comfy so I returned the lighter colors and ordered a set with darker ones.

I guess I should have paid attention to all the reviews about ordering a size down from your usual size.  The joggers are quite baggy and loose but are okay for lounging around the house or even using as pajama bottoms.  I will keep them.

I am 5’2”, 155lbs and have a pear shape body. I sized down to a medium when I’m usually a large and I’m so glad I did! These are so comfortable, thin and light. I’m also short so find it hard to find joggers short enough so they don’t scrunch up at the ankles and these just barely do. Love the length. One pair came with a small tear in the pocket and some dark dye or something but I’m hoping this was a fluke and the seller will help me resolve the issue. Would buy again!
I used these for work all the time. Super comfy and practical. Don’t fade or shrink and wash well.
These run a tad large but they are very comfortable.
The black and camo ones are perfect! They're all super comfy and cute! The blue ones are see through, but I bought these for lounging around at home anyways so it's not an issue.
These have a nice material but run baggy. I would size down if you want them to have any shape
Love the material and the side pockets, they fit nicely. I really need to know the colors I was buying.

I live the pocket ( nice for phone) so comfortable and light weight!

I love these joggers so much! I bought them to wear as scrub bottoms. The blue matches with most blue scrub tops. I love that I can wear these for work, or I can just wear them for home. They look really nice. I’ve washed them quite a few times and they are holding up. I do notice they can snag easily. At this price point, it’s still worth it.
Fit perfect. Love the feel and colors.
Love the fabric & fit! & quality !!!

I just love these pants I brought so many of these, so now I have all the colors and love the side pockets, these pants fill so soft. I'm 5'5.. 140 pounds and got a medium and they're true to size! And the material is great.
These are great pants for the price - comfortable, soft, cool & they fit well. I’d love an all black option instead of three different colors.
The material was not what I thought and way to long.  Need a return label sent to me please.

But already have the 1x on their way. Great material. Love the waist band. It's thin so it doesn't strangle your tummy! Excited!
Runs big so order a size down or two sized down to be fitted. Material is thin.
I was hoping they would be a bit looser but still comfortable.
Ordered an XL, and honestly thought they would be tight.. These are some of the most comfortable pants I have. Thinking about ordering more colors.

So comfy! I can wear them to work too! They do not go all the way down to the too of my feet but they are still long enough (I’m 5’7). The fabric is soft and smooth. I could wear them pulled up high on my tummy but I wear them down and sometimes folded but that’s a personal preference.

Great feeling jogger. The material feels good and the length is perfect; I'm 5'3". Unfortunately I have to return them but I will order them in small. The medium pants are too bulky in the seat and the waist is too big. I look forward to having them in a size that fits.
